attributes.action: immediately fire all MPs with criminal convictions and make it impossible for criminals to hold office as MPs funded from the public purse
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Baroness Scotland and Harriet Harman are 2 examples of high ranking members of government who have broken the law.  The are convicted criminals, but still hold office in positions of power.  This makes an even bigger mockery of the British government than it presently is.  Any MP with ANY criminal conviction - especially one committed while in office, should be banned from being paid from the public purse and holding office as a servant of the public including representing us as MPs

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
